short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily add RealTime Email code to your email templates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use RealTime Email to personalize your email campaigns, you can cut email production time with this extension: 

 - Launch it effortlessly on any web based email template editor 
 - Quickly and easily copy and paste your RealTime Email embed codes 
 - And for consistent real-time campaign tracking and comparisons, insert LiveData code into any email template in just two clicks

You can download the RealTime Email extension for free, but it requires a paid RealTime Email account for full access to RTE embed codes. Learn more: www.liveclicker.com
